feedbackDetail.automatedFeedback:
**Functional Purpose**: Summary title for the automated feedback section in the feedback panel.
**UI Location**: Editor → Feedback Panel → Automated Feedback (header)
**When Users See This**: When the feedback panel is open and automated feedback is available.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; replaces a hardcoded string. No special formatting.
**Current English**: "Automated Feedback"
testsTab.tests:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the Tests tab.
**UI Location**: Editor (tab bar)
**When Users See This**: As a tab in the editor interface.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; part of a UI tab. The `data-text` attribute has a hardcoded string which should remain "Tests".
**Current English**: "Tests"
feedbackTab.feedback:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the Feedback tab.
**UI Location**: Editor (tab bar)
**When Users See This**: As a tab in the editor interface.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; part of a UI tab. The `data-text` attribute has a hardcoded string which should remain "Feedback".
**Current English**: "Feedback"
